column2: <START> I have always wanted to go skiing in South Korea for 45 times, but I didn't plan to go there in the snow season until the next snow season
<START> Sam happy new year Great introduction
<START> Say happy New Year to SAM first. I love watching SAM's movies. I agree that Shin Ramen is the best instant noodles
<START> Fans in Southeast Asia also want to sign up for Tours
<START> Wow skiing is very exciting and exciting. I have never skied before and I really want to experience skiing, but I feel skiing is not easy. Hahaha has never been to Korea for a vacation
<START> I will go skiing in Japan in winter. I just started to go skiing. I want to know if there is hot spring skiing in Korean ski resort
